items.name: Cold Chocolate Mousse
items.description: Thick, creamy, and loaded with chocolate flavor

items.name: Golden Milk Latte
items.description: Cozy warming spices, your choice of milk, and can be served either hot or iced

items.name: Strawberry Smoothie
items.description: Extra creamy and fruity

items.name: Avocado Smoothie
items.description: Made with banana, avocado and coconut milk

items.name: Honeydew and Watermelon Iced Tea
items.description: Succulent and sweet, summer melon is the perfect addition to a refreshing iced tea

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crowd-pleasing salad of crisp romaine leaves, crunchy croutons, and a little or a lot of anchovy, as you like

items.name: Olive Garden Salad
items.description: Lettuce, tomatoes, olives, onion and croutons, all tossed with a creamy Italian dressing

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk and foam

items.name: Latte
items.description: Layers of espresso and steamed milk are mixed together and topped with a light layer of foam

items.name: Affogato
items.description: Traditional Italian dessert made from coffee (espresso) and ice cream

items.name: Cafe Mocha
items.description: Rich, full-bodied espresso combined with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk

items.name: White Chocolate Mocha
items.description: Espresso meets white chocolate sauce and steamed milk, and then is finished off with sweetened whipped cream

items.name: Caramel Macchiato
items.description: Steamed milk, espresso, vanilla syrup and caramel drizzle

items.name: Cold Brew
items.description: Made by steeping coffee in water for a number of hours at cold or ambient (room) temperature

items.name: Americano
items.description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema

items.name: Banana Bread
items.description: Moist texture, banana and brown sugar flavors, and super soft crumb & honey

items.name: Cinnamon Roll
items.description: Pillowy soft, gooey-in-the-middle, smothered in cream cheese frosting

items.name: Croissant
items.description: French pastry made from puff pastry in a crescent shape

items.name: Strawberry Scone
items.description: Soft, billowy, crumbly, and studded with plenty of fresh strawberries

items.name: Chocolate Gâteau de Crêpe
items.description: Gâteau de crêpes with chocolate pastry cream and dulce de leche

items.name: Coffee Donut
items.description: Moist, cake like texture and are dunked in a rich, espresso glaze

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Coffee soaked lady fingers, sweet and creamy mascarpone
